document.webtitle: In-N-Out Burger, Santa Ana - Restaurant Reviews - TripAdvisor
document.description: There's no inside place to sit, so its pretty much ... the service is better than any other fast food restaurant and ... this is for real is the long line up of cars ...
document.body:
In-N-Out Burger, Santa Ana

Home > United States > California (CA) > Orange County > Santa Ana > Santa Ana Restaurants > In-N-Out Burger
All 337 Santa Ana Restaurants» In-N-Out Burger 3361 S Bristol St , Santa Ana , CA 92704-7245 800-786-1000 Website Menu Got a photo? Add it. Ranked #2 of 337 restaurants in Santa Ana 23 Reviews Price range: $5 - $10 Cuisines: Fast Food Restaurant details Update restaurant details Write a Review 23 reviews from our community 86% Recommend Excellent 13 Very good 7 Average 2 Poor 0 Terrible 1 Rating summary Food Service Value Atmosphere 23 reviews sorted by Date Rating English first Any George K Santa Ana, California Contributor 12 reviews Reviews in 6 cities 6 helpful votes “In- N- out...still the best!!!” Reviewed June 28, 2012 For a great tasting hamburger, fast service, very nice and helpful staff and low prices, In- N- out rules. My favorite: Double burger, no cheese, grilled onions, ketchup, medium rare. Unbeatable. Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? ron m Springdale, Arkansas Senior Contributor 25 reviews Reviews in 12 cities 6 helpful votes “Outstanding Burgers” Reviewed June 25, 2012 Great food, Fast service make this a winner!! Enjoyed a cheeseburger with fries and a shake.for lunch. Fast in and out!! Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 4 more reviews by ron m for Santa Ana queenwendy huntngton beach, ca Senior Contributor 23 reviews Reviews in 12 cities 1 helpful vote “just a really good burger” Reviewed May 31, 2012 Limited menu, but for the money this is one if the best burger fast food places anywhere. The meat is flavorful and juicy. Great fries too Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? jandlman Huntington Beach, CA Senior Contributor 32 reviews Reviews in 18 cities 29 helpful votes “Great burgers and Shakes!” Reviewed May 13, 2012 Honestly, the best burgers. Tough to get the secret menu down but worth a try. Burgers are small, better get two double doubles, just in case. Fries and shakes are fantastic! Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? Jane G Tucson, Arizona Senior Contributor 38 reviews Reviews in 12 cities 6 helpful votes “In-N-Out Burger consistentantly good!” Reviewed May 11, 2012 Always consistent, always good no matter where you area. Ordered from the"secret"menu with chopped chillies and fried chopped onions on double doubles with twice-cooked fries! Very busy location with a long line of cars for take out so we parked and went inside to get our to-go. Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? callmemochelle Anaheim, CA Senior Contributor 28 reviews Reviews in 9 cities 45 helpful votes “Great for drive thru, not to sit down” Reviewed March 28, 2012 The locatiion is not the best place, as its hard to navigate in/ out of the parking area. There's no inside place to sit, so its pretty much strictly drive thru. There's 2 sides to drive thru but if you're solo, stick to the right lane. Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 8 more reviews by callmemochelle for Santa Ana rforrest california Top Contributor 57 reviews Reviews in 22 cities 8 helpful votes “Best Burgers” Reviewed March 21, 2012 Love the price, the burgers are great and always fresh Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? hbhakh Baltimore, MD Top Contributor 142 reviews Reviews in 58 cities 101 helpful votes “It's a fast food burger, nothing more” Reviewed January 21, 2012 While visiting CA, I thought is necessary to try the famous In and Out Burger. These places do an incredible business. I had the double burger and fries, which was good but really isn't much more than a typical fast food burger. I prefer Five Guys. Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 2 more reviews by hbhakh for Santa Ana mla11408 Irvine, California Contributor 19 reviews Reviews in 7 cities 1 helpful vote “cant get better than this” Reviewed January 7, 2012 sorry, but theres no better burger than an in-n-out burger. the service is better than any other fast food restaurant and the food, nothing beats it. french fries are better than anything, you have to get spread on everything!! and try the animal fries, really great. Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? Jpman7 Contributor 11 reviews Reviews in 4 cities 17 helpful votes “Excellent in every way!” Reviewed October 14, 2011 via mobile Good location, great food, what more could I ask for? Try your burger"animal style". Mmmm.. Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? 1-10 of 23 reviews « 1 2 3 » Travelers who viewed In-N-Out Burger also viewed Tangata at Bowers Museum of Cultural Art 17 Reviews Santa Ana, Orange County Mil Jugos 3 Reviews Santa Ana, Orange County California Pizza Kitchen 10 Reviews Santa Ana, Orange County 50 Forks 3 Reviews Santa Ana, Orange County All restaurants in Santa Ana (337) Been to In-N-Out Burger?
